630270.name: Fantasy Grounds - Into the Wintery Gale: Raider’s Haul (PFRPG)
630270.description:
Into the Wintery Gale: Raiders Haul (PFRPG)

Life in the Vikmordere Valley is harsh, especially during the wintery white, yet humans have survived in this brutally frigid environment for centuries. Their trials have birthed a vibrant culture bursting with an array of tools and magic items entirely unique to the region. Amidst this module you will find a selection of treasures ranging from affordable arcana to priceless artifacts useful in any campaign.
This beautifully illustrated Pathfinder Roleplaying Game compatible module includes:
  • Relevant Vikmordere cultural information
  • 29 Nordic-themed wondrous items
  • 8 magic armaments
  • 5 magic weapon
  • 2 new weapon special abilities
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder RPG and D&D 3.5/ OGL ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
